mapper.select: select trans_no,to_Number(trans_sales) as trans_sales, trans_type, trans_date from trans order by trans_no asc
select to_Number(substr (trans_date, 1, 2)) as month ,count(to_Number(substr (trans_date, 1, 2))) as amount ,sum(trans_sales) as earn from trans group by to_Number(substr (trans_date, 1, 2))
select trans_type as company,sum(to_Number(trans_sales)) as totalcost ,count(trans_type) as companyCount from trans group by trans_type
mapper.update: update trans set trans_sales=#{trans_sales}, trans_type=#{trans_type},trans_date=#{trans_date} where trans_no=#{trans_no}
